Mods: Vodka OPEN OPEN OPEN ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~Register Enabledhome enabled ban/ip bans working 1.8 and 1.7 areas. /warp 1.8 /warp spawn (1.7) Big worldhave fun on this server.

item.title: <NEW> FsCommunity 1.8.1
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:19, topic:393933”][quote author=mironic link=topic=491117.msg3774857#msg3774857 date=1318014709]

ill join if you whitelist it

why?
if i whitelist it there will be like 3 people online…

better to have less people and no greifers than more people but alot of greifers

<,< not really… then there would be no point in mods or admins…
[/quote]I doubt your staff are active 24/7, though. And it’s better to prevent the griefing in the first place than to resolve the issue afterwards.[/quote] i am on 12 hours and kracky is on and off, my third staff member has been away on vacation but yes, our staff is available at all times during the day.

Read full topic

item.title: <NEW> FsCommunity 1.8.1
item.dc:creator: @Cole1497 Cole1497
item.description:
@Cole1497 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:12, topic:393933”][quote author=mironic link=topic=491117.msg3592012#msg3592012 date=1304719611]

If you are running Bukkit (and you are, since you have LWC up there), then why not run Big Brother so you can roll back griefers?

Also I laughed at this:

80% lagg free (untill we get things properly set up then it will be 100% lag free)

How could you possibly determine the percentage of ‘lag free’? Also how do you intend to improve it? Since it is almost surely the result of your slow residential internet connection?

Well becuase ive been failing at setting it up, and you can determine the percent of lag from the MS. the common ms we have is about 70ms atm… wich is about 20% lag so 80% lagg free, if i get it down to 20 - 40ms i would be able to improve it :3…

and i am on a vps i just need to upgrade it for meow bandwith and it will be fixed, should be soon :3
[/quote]
How do you figure 70ms is 20% lag? That is what I am talking about, it makes absolutely no sense whatsoever.[/quote]
Does it honestly matter?

Read full topic
